text: tavada, sæbævin ma ohuge rajakamata salakuna vanuye numbala veta mamjusavak pahala vimayi. ehi numbalage paramadhipati vetin santiyada, musage parapura ha harun ge parapura ata hæra dama giya dæyin itiri va æti deyada æta. eya malak varun (visin) usula gena enu læbe. numbala visvasa vantayin nam niyata vasayen ma ehi numbalata sadhakayak æta, yæyi ovunge nabi ovun amata pævasuveya
